name: Kill The Streamer (Alarik Games)
description:
Fight against the Twitch Chat

  •  Emotes in the chat spawns zombies in game
  •  Buy new weapons to survive waves of chat zombies
  •  4 enemy types generated randomly for each emote
  •  Currently support for normal and FFZ emotes (no BTTV)

To be added

  • More enemy types
  • More gun types (flame thrower, bazooka etc.)
  • Sound FX
  • More chat interactions with chat commands like !boost

Bug reports, balance suggestions and such are greatly appreciated!
